name: Rise of the Mummy
description:
Rise of the Mummy :

Zip file content :

- Rise Of The Mummy_Data.zip (Windows game build with Rise Of The Mummy.exe to launch the game)

- RotM-Sources.zip (Game Assets folder with scripts and imported packages)

Controls :

Navigate in UI with Mouse

Move with WASD or →↓↑←

Sprint with SHIFT and jump with SPACE
